ygData.subject: The End is Near...........
ygData.msgSnippet: Dracona looked into the pit. Plintissa wasn t moving. Dracona smiled and walked back toward her base. A dagger flew into Dracona s back. She spun around and

	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Dracona looked into the pit. Plintissa wasn't moving. Dracona smiled and wa=
lked back toward her base. A dagger flew into Dracona's back. She spun arou=
nd and grabbed the dagger in pain. Plintissa stood there.

"You do not know=
 when to give up, you fool, but never mind that your an idiot, I'm going to=
 grind you so small you won't be able to be seen with a microscope!" Dracon=
a said. She kept her hand covered and flung the dagger back. It missed Plin=
tissa and hit Artist in the leg. Dracona smiled in satisfaction. Plintissa =
tackled Dacona and took her down. Dracona once again turned to her saw blad=
e to saw into Plintissa. Dracona fired an ice beam, but Plintissa dodged. D=
racona started to burn everything with fire beams. Plintissa still avoids i=
t. Plintissa was always a good fighter, but it wasn't until now, after her =
bad life that she discovered her true fighting power. Plintissa beat Dracon=
a mercilessly. Draocona's parts were flung everywhere as Plintissa spun a s=
imple stick through the air. Dracona raised the saw blade and sliced the st=
ick to pieces. Dracona laughed and sliced Plintissa several hundred times. =
Plintissa fell.

"Th weak move aside and die so the strong can survive. As =
ancient as the Cosmos, that has always been the way of things. I'm sorry Pl=
intissa, you were a good friend, but don't take this personally, it's just =
business." Dracona said.

Dracona pulled back the saw blade and thrust it t=
owards Plintissa. Plintissa grabbed her arm from earlier and threw it. It h=
it Dracona's blade. Dracona slammed it into Plintissa, but as she did, the =
blade came loose before it hit Plintissa. The blade flew up. Dracona blinke=
d her eye, the one Dinobot had scarred when she first arived on the planet.=
 The blade sawed through Dracona and left her in pieces everywhere. Her spa=
rk extinguished. Her last words were:

"*Cough, Cough* Zardus I am sorry. P=
lintissa, do not forget your promise." And Dracona died smiling. Plintissa =
remembered that she promised Dracona that she would never leave her sitting=
. Plintissa cried. Her mech fluid ran everywhere and she got weaker and wea=
ker. Artist stepped slowly over to Plintissa. He was crying, too.

"Artist,=
 I'm sorry it had to end this way." Plintissa whispered.

"Why are you leav=
ing me, Plintissa? Why does everyone betray me?" Artist asked.

"Artist, th=
ere floats Dracona's spark, recover it, we can't part, she really was my fr=
iend." Artist walked up and captured the extinguished spark as it tried to =
fly away. He contained it in a capsule.

"Plintissa, if you leave me, I'll.=
..have no more reason to live, all my friends are gone, my helping days are=
 over." Artist said.

"Your helping days are never over, and we'll always b=
e together." Plintissa said.

"This isn't some lame thing about how you'll =
always be in my heart, is it?"

"No, Artist, come here." Plintissa whispere=
d. Artist looked at Team Ultima's base. It was destroyed, the funny thing w=
as, that it was destroyed by Dracona, the very one, along with Plintissa, t=
hat originally built it. And there it was, sticking above ground now and bu=
rning away. Sinesis looks at the base and sighs.

"Twister, Dracona is dead=
, I guess we have to leave." Sinesis says. Sinister stands next to Blizzard=
 and sighs.

"Blizzard, we need to find another home, now." Sinister said s=
adly.

Artist came closer to Plintissa. Her spark suddenly burst from her a=
nd floated into Artist's hands. She said to him what he needed to do. He op=
ened his chest compartment and his spark was revealed. Artist combined Plin=
tissa's spark with his own, they became one.

"Till all are one." Artist wh=
ispered really low. Plintissa told him she still loved him. Artist was over=
joyed! Plintissa was with him now, and now they could never be seperated ag=
ain. Artist, completely ignoring Blizzard and Sinister, and Sinesis and Twi=
ster. ran out into a field.

"Artist, now we need to take care of Dracona's=
 spark." Plintissa said. (Remember, only Artist can hear Plintissa now) Art=
ist headed toward the Maximal base, there Dracona would get a new body, one=
 she could not attack anyone ever again in, and where she can always be hel=
pful. Artist held up the contained, Dracona's spark still inside.

"I love =
you." Artist said seemingly to nobody.

"I love you too." Plintissa said to=
 Artist. Artist continued walking to the Maximal base...
